title: Pirate's Adventure Fantasy Music Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring 44 fantasy instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Pirate's Adventure is a fantasy music pack that contains 44 tracks perfect for adventure-based projects!


Main Themes:

A Pirate's Adventure A Minor 160 BPM

A Sea At War D Minor 130 BPM

A Traveler's Tale G Major 90 BPM

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 44

Number of Audio Cues: 44

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Supported Development Platforms:
